description.zh: Logseq 是一个注重隐私、开源的知识管理和协作平台。它支持 Markdown 和 Org-mode，提供任务管理、PDF 注释和知识整理等工具。该平台通过空间画布帮助用户可视化连接想法，并支持实时协作和移动端访问。
description.en: Logseq is a privacy-first, open-source platform designed for knowledge management and collaboration. It supports Markdown and Org-mode, offering tools for task management, PDF annotation, and knowledge organization. The platform enables users to visually connect ideas through a spatial canvas and supports real-time collaboration and mobile access.

feature.zh:
## 产品优势:

- 开源且注重用户隐私
- 支持长期知识存储与用户自主控制
- 为知识工作者和视觉思考者提供强大工具

## 功能列表:

- 支持 Markdown 和 Org-mode 格式
- 提供 PDF 注释和任务管理功能
- 白板功能支持图形、绘图和连接线进行可视化组织
- 支持实时协作（RTC）和跨设备同步
- 提供插件 API 用于自定义和扩展工作流
- 拥有移动端应用，支持大部分桌面功能
feature.en:
## Benefits:

- Open-source and privacy-focused
- Supports long-term knowledge storage and user control
- Offers powerful tools for knowledge workers and visual thinkers

## Features:

- Supports Markdown and Org-mode formats
- Provides PDF annotation and task management capabilities
- Features a Whiteboard for visual organization with shapes, drawings, and connectors
- Enables real-time collaboration (RTC) and cross-device syncing
- Includes plugin API for customization and workflow extension
- Available on mobile with most desktop features
